name: Stasyan: Music Really Bad The Game
name_original: Stasyan: Music Really Bad The Game
description:
Take control of Stasyan in his quest to stop eternal darkness taking over the world.

Controls:

  • A-D to Move
  • LMB to Shoot
  • Space to Jump
  • F4 toggle Fullscreen
  • Esc - back to main menu

Programming, Art, SFX Design, Music - by Neo_Kesha (Artyom Yashin)

SFX assets from FreeSound

This game is an Entry for Katana Jam 2021
